_header: Candlemass is a feast high and holy through all thing
_description: Feast of the Purification, in some texts of the South English Legendary — in couplets

CamTCC605.First Lines:
Candelmasse ys a feste heye & holy þorȝe alle
                    þyngfor þan me schulleþ to churche go & candlen in honde
                    bring…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…Now god mayde marie sone þat folwed þe nywe laylyne
                    þat we oure offryng do oure lord & his moder to pay
CamTCC605.Facsimiles:
Digital Facsimile of Trinity College Cambridge MS R.3.25.
         https://mss-cat.trin.cam.ac.uk/Manuscript/R.3.25.
